txt.en: Enkárvo can be found in the Dorwinion camp, in the hills east of Dale.\n\nYou should bring the berries and firewood you gathered back to Enkárvo.
'You have done what I could not ask of you. Your help and humility are beyond reckoning, [placeholder]!'
Among the Refugees: Hunger and Cold
The camps of the Easterling refugees are in the hills east of Dale.\n\nYou should help the refugees by gathering firewood and blue berries for them.

'Many are our needs, but food and warmth are first among them. There is good wood among the trees and a blue berry we have found that is good for eating, but we cannot seem to gather either.\n\n'I would not beg your help in such menial tasks... but any of these things you happened to gather would be gratefully received!'
The Easterling refugee encampments need more food and firewood than they can gather.
